thread.title: BRIEF-Aqua America Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.30

title: BRIEF-Aqua America Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.30
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Aqua America Inc:
* AQUA AMERICA REPORTS EARNINGS FOR 2017, ANNOUNCES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 REVENUE $203.3 MILLION VERSUS $196.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.37 TO $1.42 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * SEES INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENTS OF APPROXIMATELY $1.4 BILLION THROUGH 2020
* SEES INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENTS OF APPROXIMATELY $500 MILLION IN 2018
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $208.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.44 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
